text: Tando Bago () is a town in Badin District, Sindh, Pakistan. The taluka (township) of Tando Bago had a population of 321,818 in 2008. The Sindh government operates approximately 589 schools in Tando Bago. == References == Category:Populated places in Badin District Category:Talukas of Sindh Category:Tehsils of Sindh
title: Tando Bago
